Smart Glove: A glove equipped with sensors that can track hand movements and gestures, allowing for intuitive control of smart devices.
Climate-Controlled Glove: A glove with built-in heating and cooling mechanisms that regulate the temperature of the hand to maintain optimal comfort.
Multi-Functional Glove: A glove that can transform into different shapes and sizes, providing versatility and convenience in various activities.
Glove with Augmented Reality: A glove with integrated augmented reality technology that provides real-time information and visual enhancements to the user.
Self-Cleaning Glove: A glove with a self-cleaning mechanism that removes dirt and bacteria from the surface, providing a clean and hygienic experience.
